Dear Frank:
t*0* /) I have your letter of August 8th and I didn't
know there was any problem in connection with the attend-
dance at the convention.
Aren't most of the people who attend still con¬
nected with radio stations and their operation or manage¬
ment? Why aren't they able to attend our convention if
they can attend the Midwest School Broadcast Conference
later on? As for myself, I had been planning to go to
Wisconsin, ^
